title: Screen Rant: Movie News, Movie Reviews, Movie Trailers, TV News
description: All the latest movie news, movie trailers & reviews - and the same for TV, too.

p: Subscribers to the Apple Arcade service get access to a catalog of more than 200 games, including some big names. Here are the best to try right now.
The next entry in the James Bond franchise needs to avoid using the same kind of copycat trick that Casino Royale utilized almost two decades ago.
Asgardians are some of the most powerful people in the MCU thanks to their physiology, but some rank a lot more highly in power levels than others.
A Young Sheldon season 7 set video reveals the first look at Georgie (Montana Jordan) potentially during George's (Lance Barber) funeral.
The long running One Piece is well known for having some of the best foreshadowing in manga, but what were its best foreshadowed details?
The best K-drama of 2024 so far has broken all sorts of records, including one set by Crash Landing on You, and may already be a classic of its genre.
Star Trek: Discovery brought back the ISS Enterprise, revealing that the Mirror Universe ship set a new Star Trek record for ships named Enterprise.
Gamestop and Jazwares have revealed a brand-new Darth Revan replica mask, allowing Star Wars collectors to become KOTOR's greatest Sith Lord.
Mufasa: The Lion King will delve into the origins of Mufasa and Scar, with the latter's original name reflecting a classic piece of Disney canon.
A new trailer for Jurassic World: Chaos Theory has plenty of callbacks to the original movie as it continues the story of Camp Cretaceous years later.
There's no doubt that Nolan's The Dark Knight is a great DC movie, but its particular take on Batman is still holding other interpretations back.
The new Karate Kid movie has been pushed back to May 2025, allowing Cobra Kai season 6 to release first - and this seemingly proves a popular theory.
Quentin Tarantino may not be directing a Star Trek movie, but his love of Star Trek stems from being a fan of William Shatner's Captain Kirk.
Suits season 4 had some of the legal drama’s best episodes, yet it wasted what could have been a fantastic villain arc centered on Louis and Mike.
In Spider-Woman #7, Jessica Drew reveals why she can get away with wearing the bright and colorful costume, even in her role as a super-spy.
A new House of the Dragon season 2 star teases her powerful and prophetic character and the role she will play in the Dance of the Dragons.
The Empire Strikes Back has the best plot twist in all of Star Wars, and no other moment in the franchise has yet to replicate its shocking reveal.
Jeff Bridges' legacy addition to the cast of Tron: Ares will mark the end of a 7-year feature film hiatus, adding even more anticipation to the movie.
Netflix's hit thriller miniseries with a 97% on Rotten Tomatoes Baby Reindeer is still the Number 1 show on the platform in week 3 of its release.
Director Karyn Kusama reveals that Fast and Furious star Michelle Rodriguez predicted the franchise’s decades-long success 23 years ago.
Netflix is known for its revolving door of exciting content, past and present, and there are many great titles to watch right now before they're gone.
Batman frequently delivers iconic dialogue. As one of the most revered Batman performances, Keaton has proffered some especially effective quotations.
One-Punch Man has featured deadly villains, but the enigmatic God's abilities have remained a secret, at least until now.
The 2022 movie Lifemark, which follows the story of an adoptee reconnecting with his birth mother, has found newfound successes on Netflix.
h3:
